it.polimi.se2019.model

Class GameBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2019.model.GameBoard

  • public class GameBoard
extends java.lang.Object
    The game board is the root class of each game. It contains and initializes every element of the game, and is responsible for managing the highest tasks of the match (AKA the game manager)
